abstracts.cdata!:
The project would support the industrial
            development of Haiti by making medium- and long-term credit
            available to the industrial sector through FDI established
            within BRH to provide a rediscounting and guarantee
            mechanism for participating financial intermediaries. The
            project also includes a technical assistance component to
            help develop medium- and small-scale industry and to assist
            the institutional development of BRH, FDI and the Office of
            Industrial Promotion (ONAPI). Through the provision of
            medium- and long-term funds and technical assistance, the
            project would help expand the industrial sector and
            contribute to improving its efficiency. The project would
            directly create about 2,000 jobs, and, through its built-in
            incentives, stimulate the financing of small- and
            medium-scale industry, which, thus far, has had no access to
            medium- and long-term credit.
